channel.title: Latest Mozilla Add-on Releases
channel.description: RSS feed of the latest add-on updates from Mozilla Add-ons (AMO)

item.title: Tab Session Manager v7.2.1
item.description:
Tab Session Manager v7.2.1
Save and restore the state of windows and tabs. It also supports automatic saving and cloud sync.
Author: sienori • Users: 156120 • Categories: appearance, tabs • Homepage (en-US): https://tab-session-manager.sienori.com/ • Works with Firefox: 109.0a1 and later • ID: 859942
item.author: sienori

item.title: Enreach SP GitLab Enhancer v1.28
item.description:
Enreach SP GitLab Enhancer v1.28
Internal Enreach SP extension. Enhances GitLab with Approve/Rebase buttons, Jenkins build status, MR filters (target branch, author, drafts), and UI improvements
Author: Eric Blanquer • Users: 3 • Categories: other • Homepage: https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/gitlab-enhancer/ • Works with Firefox: 109.0a1 and later • ID: 2964336
item.author: Eric Blanquer

item.title: GreenScore v1.1
item.description:
GreenScore v1.1
GreenScore mesure l'empreinte carbone web par utilisateur et organisation via un plugin et une plateforme. Profitez de tableaux de bord, d'analyses et d'un classement des sites énergivores pour promouvoir un numérique plus durable.
Author: GreenScore • Users: 1 • Categories: other • Homepage: https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/greenscoreplugin/ • Works with Firefox: 58.0 and later • ID: 2969616
item.author: GreenScore

item.title: Tab Guardian v1.17.1
item.description:
Tab Guardian v1.17.1
Tired of losing important browser tabs and bookmarks? Tab Guardian is your free, open-source solution to save, organize, and protect your browsing tabs—without any hidden costs or tracking. Create private, encrypted groups for your private things.
Author: Serhii • Users: 3 • Categories: privacy-security, bookmarks, tabs • Homepage: https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/tab-guardian/ • Works with Firefox: 58.0 and later • ID: 2930677
item.author: Serhii

item.title: Яндекс Вордстат Extension v3.9.124
item.description:
Яндекс Вордстат Extension v3.9.124
Браузерное расширение Яндекс Вордстат Extension позволяет значительно ускорить сбор и кластеризацию поисковых фраз из сервиса подбора слов Яндекс Wordstat (wordstat.yandex.ru) и производить их экспорт в буфер обмена либо в Excel.
Author: BrokenByte Software • Users: 154 • Categories: language-support • Homepage (ru): https://site-analyzer.ru/soft/seo-extension-wordstat/ • Works with Firefox: 109.0a1 and later • ID: 2843879
item.author: BrokenByte Software
